subtitleNullable: Ready to eat: Discover the convenience of self-heating rice
descriptionNullable:
## Dataset background
With the acceleration of the pace of modern life, convenient food, especially self-heating rice, has become the choice of more and more consumers. Due to its simple preparation process and rich taste, self-heating rice has quickly gained popularity around the world. Considering the growing market share of this food category, this dataset aims to provide comprehensive sales data to analyze consumer buying behavior, market trends, and regional differences.

## Source of inspiration
This dataset is inspired by the ongoing focus on FMCG market dynamics and interest in emerging food technologies. Self-heating rice is an innovative product category that demonstrates how food technology can integrate into daily life and meet modern consumers' demands for speed and convenience. In-depth analysis of self-heating rice sales data can reveal changes in consumer preferences and help manufacturers and retailers better adjust market strategies.

## Data Sources
This data set brings together information from multiple data sources, including sales records provided by retailers, market research reports, and consumer survey data. In addition, industry analysis reports related to food technology and consumer trends were also consulted to enhance the comprehensiveness and depth of the data set. With these rich data sources, the dataset is able to provide not only self-heating rice sales data but also a macro perspective of market trends.

This background overview provides a clear starting point for the use of the data set, helping users understand the value and application areas of the data.
